title: Adding Onex Testnet as a new consumer chain to Onomy Testnet
description:
# Launching Onex as a consumer chain

This is the proposal to launch the Onex consumer chain, "onex-testnet-6".

Please visit the [onomyprotocol/onex](https://github.com/onomyprotocol/onex/tree/dev/chain/onex-testnet-6) repo for additional details.
